Recent Doc Updates

14-April-2023

New Docs

Major updates

  • Title: Code Snippets using the Native SDK for iOS
  • Description: Added snippet to detect when the player is in view to start and stop video playback
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/ios/resources/code-snippets-using-native-sdk-ios.html#Start_playback_when_in_view
  • Product: Device SDKs
  • Product Area: Native SDK for iOS
  • Title: Code Snippets using the Native SDK for Android
  • Description: Added snippet to detect when the player is in view to start and stop video playback
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/resources/code-snippets-using-native-sdk-android.html#Start_playback_when_in_view
  • Product: Device SDKs
  • Product Area: Native SDK for Android

Minor updates

7-April-2023

New Brightcove Academy Courses

New Docs

  • Title: SpringServe Ad Macros with the Native SDKs
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to take advantage of ad monetization when using client-side ad insertion (CSAI) with the Brightcove Native SDKs. - New Product Feature!
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/features/springserve-with-sdks.html
  • Product: Device SDKs
  • Product Area: Ad monetization

Major updates

  • Title: Sending Brightcove Analytics from the Native SDK for Android
  • Description: Updated text and code snippet for sending account ID
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/analytics/sending-brightcove-analytics-native-sdk-android.html
  • Product: Device SDKs
  • Product Area: Native SDK for Android

Minor updates

  • Title: Brightcove Native SDK for Android Release Notes
  • Description: Added ExoPlayer version to the Android release notes
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/resources/brightcove-native-sdk-android-release-notes.html
  • Product: Device SDKs
  • Product Area: Native SDK for Android
